document.full_text: the budget passed by the texas house would cut medicaid reimbursements to all texas providers by 10 percent, and state officials confirm that the financial impact on nursing homes would be even greater.
document.title: the texas tribune: at nursing homes, fears of a budget 'armageddon'
lines_and_colors: the budget passed by the texas house would cut medicaid reimbursements to all texas providers by 10 percent, and state officials confirm that the financial impact on nursing homes would be even greater.
